text: Agnès Raharolahy in 2014 Agnès Raharolahy (born 7 November 1992 in Alençon) is a French athlete specialising in the 400 metres. She has won several medals in the 4 × 400 metres relay. Her best individual success to date is the bronze medal at the 2013 Mediterranean Games. She is of Malagasy descent. Her personal bests in the event are 52.48 seconds outdoors (Castres 2014) and 53.25 seconds indoors (Aubière 2013). ==Competition record== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |rowspan=2|2011
